column1: Little Goat Diner////We started with the goat chili cheese fries and boy
column2: they were RICH. Perfectly crispy fries
column3: drenched in a creamy cheese sauce with chunks of goat hiding under every fry. Beans
column5: and chickpeas complete the goat chili topping to these fries. Absolutely order these - but prepare to be full before your entree arrives.
